lead_paragraph: The Charlotte Hornets and Portland Trail Blazers are hoping a change in venue will provide some mojo in the NBA playoffs, while the Oklahoma City Thunder and Toronto Raptors look to take 3-1 leads in their first-round series Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Hornets, Blazers Need a Win; Thunder, Raptors Seek 3-1 Leads
headline.main: Hornets, Blazers Need a Win; Thunder, Raptors Seek 3-1 Leads
